# Pull Request: Rename to Revenue-Instrumented Application Platform

## Summary

This PR renames the engineering system from "AI FinOps Checkout Platform Engineering" to "Revenue-Instrumented Application Platform" to better reflect the system's focus on revenue instrumentation, transaction integrity, and value signal generation.

## Changes

### System Renaming
- ✅ Renamed engineering system from "AI FinOps Checkout Platform Engineering" to "Revenue-Instrumented Application Platform"
- ✅ Updated directory from `ai-finops-checkout-platform-engineering` to `revenue-instrumented-application-platform`
- ✅ Updated all core documentation files:
  - `README.md` - System name, domain, and terminology
  - `business-context.md` - Business context and objectives
  - `architecture.md` - Architecture scope and design
  - `implementation.md` - Implementation descriptions
  - `validation.md` - Validation descriptions
- ✅ Updated terminology from "checkout platform" to "revenue-instrumented application platform" throughout
- ✅ Maintained execution files with original names (01-ai-finops-vercel.md, 02-ai-finops-stripe.md, 03-ai-finops-posthog.md)

### Repository Index Updates
- ✅ Updated `README.md` (root) - "More Engineering Systems" section
- ✅ Updated `engineering-systems/README.md` - Engineering Systems Index table
- ✅ Updated `engineering-systems/README.md` - Additional Engineering Systems list

### Quality Assurance
- ✅ Removed duplicate directory
- ✅ Comprehensive quality check performed across all 12 engineering systems
- ✅ Verified all required sections present (System Architecture, How to Read, Boundaries, Execution Path, Evidence Map)
- ✅ Verified all navigation links and references
- ✅ Confirmed 100% structural consistency
- ✅ No linter errors detected

### Documentation
- ✅ Updated `CHANGELOG.md` with today's activities
